title: Zealot

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All roles this game are Town roles.
- The host may choose to modkill players and disguise their cause of death. They may also choose to disguise player's true roles.
- The game ends when the host is hung. Or when there are two remaining players. In either scenario, the Town will win.
- Reroll this immediately, before giving it to a player.

desc:
Post 5130
*God is real, He's there! Nobody sees Him!*
